entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 2:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -23.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: ESE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 over northern sections. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 over northern sections early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5 except minus 12 over southeastern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5 except minus 12 over southeastern sections. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
